name: Phoneme-classifier
tagline: A Project for phoneme classification (for speech recognition systems) which includes 3 necessary components: a decoder (from HTK), a trainer and a database shuffler
body:
# phoneme-classifier 
A Project for phoneme classification (for speech recognition systems) which includes 3 necessary components: a decoder (from HTK), a trainer and a database shuffler
# builds
The builds folder contains runnable executables
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
